page.title: 16TRANSPORT IN BURSCOUGH 2
page.content:
RAILWAYS There are 2 railway stations in Burscough: Burscough Bridge and Burscough Junction. Burscough Bridge trains go from Southport to Wigan, Manchester and Leeds. Trains from Burscough Junction go to Preston and Ormskirk. We examined the time table for Burscough Bridge and found there to be 25 trains east and 28 trains west each week day. On Sundays there are only 10 trains. Some trains only stop at large stations but others stop at all the small villages in between,to allow the people to travel to work,shops or school.
Roads page 14 Canals page 16
